title: Project Management-Based Instructional Design for Developing and Transitioning Online Science Curricula

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Project management-based instructional design for developing and transitioning large-scale online science education courses for managers/leaders in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: They can explain a step-by-step process for converting traditional face-to-face science curricula to online formats using project management techniques.
Based on the ADDIE model, learners can analyze content development requirements for online science courses and create design documentation
Learners can propose at least three strategies to implement effective online learning activities in limited technological environments (smartphone-centric)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
